Classes/AnnoyIndex/DistanceMetric.html#/.name: angular
Classes/AnnoyIndex/DistanceMetric.html#/.abstract: The angular distance used is the Euclidean distance of normalized vectors, which is sqrt(2(1-cos(u,v)))

Classes/AnnoyIndex/DistanceMetric.html#/.name: dotProduct
Classes/AnnoyIndex/DistanceMetric.html#/.abstract: The dot product also called the inner product.

Classes/AnnoyIndex/DistanceMetric.html#/.name: euclidean
Classes/AnnoyIndex/DistanceMetric.html#/.abstract: The L2 or straight line distance as calculated using the Pythagorean formula

Classes/AnnoyIndex.html#/s:10SwiftAnnoy0.name: itemLength
Classes/AnnoyIndex.html#/s:10SwiftAnnoy0.abstract: The length of each vector (Array count if you wish) for each item in the index.

Classes/AnnoyIndex.html#/s:10SwiftAnnoy0.name: distanceMetric
Classes/AnnoyIndex.html#/s:10SwiftAnnoy0.abstract: The distance metric used to measure the similarity between vectors.

Classes/AnnoyIndex.html#/s:10SwiftAnnoy0.name: dataType
Classes/AnnoyIndex.html#/s:10SwiftAnnoy0.abstract: The type of data being used in each vector.

Classes/AnnoyIndex.html#/s:10SwiftAnnoy0.name: numberOfItems
Classes/AnnoyIndex.html#/s:10SwiftAnnoy0.abstract: The number of items in the index.

Classes/AnnoyIndex.html#/s:10SwiftAnnoy0.name: numberOfTrees
Classes/AnnoyIndex.html#/s:10SwiftAnnoy0.abstract: The number of trees in the index. (if built)

Classes/AnnoyIndex.html#/s:10SwiftAnnoy0.name: addItem(index:vector:)
Classes/AnnoyIndex.html#/s:10SwiftAnnoy0.abstract: Adds an a new item to the index.

Classes/AnnoyIndex.html#/s:10SwiftAnnoy0.name: addItems(items:)
Classes/AnnoyIndex.html#/s:10SwiftAnnoy0.abstract: Adds multiple new items to the index.

Classes/AnnoyIndex.html#/s:10SwiftAnnoy0.name: build(numTrees:)
Classes/AnnoyIndex.html#/s:10SwiftAnnoy0.abstract: Builds the index to allow for fast approximate nearest neighbors lookup.

Classes/AnnoyIndex.html#/s:10SwiftAnnoy0.name: unbuild()
Classes/AnnoyIndex.html#/s:10SwiftAnnoy0.abstract: Unbuilds the current AnnoyIndex which allows additional items to be added or for the index to be rebuilt with a

Classes/AnnoyIndex.html#/s:10SwiftAnnoy0.name: save(url:prefault:)
Classes/AnnoyIndex.html#/s:10SwiftAnnoy0.abstract: Saves the current index to a file then immediately loads (memory maps) the index from disk.

Classes/AnnoyIndex.html#/s:10SwiftAnnoy0.name: unload()
Classes/AnnoyIndex.html#/s:10SwiftAnnoy0.abstract: Unloads the underlying index and all associated items.

Classes/AnnoyIndex.html#/s:10SwiftAnnoy0.name: getDistance(item1:item2:)
Classes/AnnoyIndex.html#/s:10SwiftAnnoy0.abstract: Calculates the distance between two items in the index.

Classes/AnnoyIndex.html#/s:10SwiftAnnoy0.name: getNNsForItem(item:neighbors:search_k:)
Classes/AnnoyIndex.html#/s:10SwiftAnnoy0.abstract: Gathers the approximate nearest neighbors for an item.

Classes/AnnoyIndex.html#/s:10SwiftAnnoy0.name: getNNsForVector(vector:neighbors:search_k:)
Classes/AnnoyIndex.html#/s:10SwiftAnnoy0.abstract: Gathers the approximate nearest neighbors for a vector.

Classes/AnnoyIndex.html#/s:10SwiftAnnoy0.name: setVerbos(boolVal:)
Classes/AnnoyIndex.html#/s:10SwiftAnnoy0.abstract: When set to true provides additional information about operations carried out by Annoy via stdout.

Classes/AnnoyIndex.html#/s:10SwiftAnnoy0.name: getItem(index:)
Classes/AnnoyIndex.html#/s:10SwiftAnnoy0.abstract: Retrieves the vector for an item in the index.

Classes/AnnoyIndex.html#/s:10SwiftAnnoy0.name: setSeed(seedVal:)
Classes/AnnoyIndex.html#/s:10SwiftAnnoy0.abstract: Sets the random seed used for generating the index. Setting this value is useful when running performance testing to ensure consistent results.

Classes/AnnoyIndex.html#/s:10SwiftAnnoy0.name: onDiskBuild(url:)
Classes/AnnoyIndex.html#/s:10SwiftAnnoy0.abstract: Prepares the index to be built on disk rather than in RAM. Should be set before adding items to the index.

Classes/AnnoyIndex.html.name: AnnoyIndex
Classes/AnnoyIndex.html.abstract: The primary generic class used to create an index.
